services.name: AI saas product
services.description: We build scalable AI-powered SaaS solutions that automate tasks, deliver insights, and boost business performance.

services.name: Data and intelligence..
services.description: We turn complex data into clear, actionable insights using AI and advanced analytics—empowering smarter decisions.

services.name: AI for E-commerce
services.description: We enhance e-commerce with AI-powered, dynamic pricing, and personalized customer experiences.

services.name: AI consulting
services.description: We guide businesses in adopting AI strategies, optimizing processes, and integrating technologies for lasting success.

services.name: AI chatbot virtual
services.description: We create intelligent chatbots and virtual assistants that improve customer support and automate interactions 24/7.

services.name: AI - marketing
services.description: Use AI to target audiences, personalize campaigns, and analyze data for better engagement and results.

about_features.title: Smarter insights
about_features.content: Make faster, data-driven decisions powered by real-time AI analysis and prediction.

about_features.title: Integrated AI solutions
about_features.content: No extra tools or plugins needed. Get built-in, scalable AI from day one.

about_features.title: End-to-end automation
about_features.content: Eliminate bottlenecks with intelligent workflows that never leave you guessing.

hiring_process.title: Send your CV
hiring_process.content: Apply for a position by sending us your CV or providing a link to your LinkedIn profile, and take the first step toward joining our team.

hiring_process.title: Initial screening
hiring_process.content: We perform an initial screening to review your experience and fit for the role.

hiring_process.title: Job interview
hiring_process.content: Selected candidates are invited to interviews with the hiring team to assess skills and alignment.

hiring_process.title: Test task
hiring_process.content: For some roles, we provide a short take-home test or practical task to evaluate hands-on skills.

hiring_process.title: You're hired!
hiring_process.content: Successful candidates receive an offer and onboarding details to get started with our team.

faqs.question: What services do you offer?
faqs.answer: We provide AI product development, data & analytics, AI for e-commerce, AI consulting, chatbots, and AI-driven marketing solutions.
bullets: Instant Setup – Add your URL, and the chatbot trains itself.
Self-Learning – Learns from real customer questions.
Smarter with Data – More data means better answers.

faqs.question: How long does a typical project take?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary by scope; small pilots often take 4–8 weeks and full product builds typically range from 3–6 months.
bullets: Pilot Projects – Small pilots typically 4–8 weeks.
Full Builds – Product builds often 3–6 months.
Iterative Delivery – We release in phases to show value early.

faqs.question: How do you handle data privacy and security?
faqs.answer: We follow best practices including encryption in transit and at rest, access controls, and can support on-premise or private-cloud deployments per client requirements.
bullets: Encryption – Data encrypted in transit and at rest.
Access Controls – Role-based access and audit logging.
Deployment Options – Cloud, private-cloud, or on-premise.

faqs.question: Do you provide post-launch support and maintenance?
faqs.answer: Yes — we offer ongoing support, monitoring, and iterative improvements through managed services or retainer agreements.
bullets: Improvements – Regular model and flow updates.
Support Plans – Flexible SLAs and retainer options.

faqs.question: Can your solutions integrate with existing systems?
faqs.answer: Absolutely — we build APIs and connectors to integrate with CRMs, e-commerce platforms, databases, and other enterprise systems.
bullets: APIs – REST APIs and webhooks for easy integration.
Connectors – Ready connectors for CRMs and e-commerce.
Custom Integration – We build custom adapters as needed.

faqs.question: How do you price your projects?
faqs.answer: Pricing depends on scope, complexity, and delivery model; we offer fixed-price, time-and-materials, and outcome-based engagements.
bullets: Flexible Models – Fixed-price, T&M, and outcome-based.
Estimates – We provide detailed proposals and milestones.
Transparent Billing – Clear scope and invoicing.
